Armour.Name: Shroud of Whispering Winds
Armour.Description: A cloak that seems to shift and flow like the breeze, crafted by the ancient wind spirits.
Armour.UniqueProperties: +3 Dexterity; Windwalk ability granting increased movement speed
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Grants immunity to immobilization and slow effects

Armour.Name: Boots of the Silent Pathfinder
Armour.Description: These boots leave no tracks, perfect for those who wish to move unseen and unheard.

Armour.Name: Mask of the Ethereal Vision
Armour.Description: A mask that allows one to see through illusions and identify enemies hidden in the shadows.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Allows the wearer to see hidden traps and enemies
